com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Interface MenuItemSelectable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MenuItem, Serializable, WComponent, WebComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WMenuItem, WSubMenu

    public interface MenuItemSelectable
extends MenuItem
    Indicates a menu item can be selected.
    Since:
    1.0.2
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectability

        Boolean getSelectability()
        Returns:
        true if this item is selectable, false if not, or null if default to its container.

      • setSelectability

        void setSelectability(Boolean selectability)
        Parameters:
        selectability - true if this item is selectable, false if not, or null to default to the container.

      • isSelected

        boolean isSelected()
        Returns:
        true if selected, otherwise false
